content.description: Sit start with a left hand two-finger pocket and a right hand pinch. From there, move up and left through a series of edges, bumps, and sidepulls to reach the lip and an easy mantle.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing is very good, but there is a rock below the topout.
content.location: It traverses the north face of Vacay.

content.description:
Kill It With Murder climbs a 45 degree lowball overhang on a perfect, vertical edge system.

Sit start with a left hand two-finger pocket and a right hand sidepull. From there, reach a left hand incut gaston, set the feet, stick the lip, throw a heel over, and top it out.

Or skip the pleasantries and just dyno to the lip.
content.protection: A pair of pads will be fine. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the west face overhang of Vacay.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand two-finger pocket and a right hand pinch. From there, work up and slight right to reach an easy mantle.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is good.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Vacay.
